CustomField.description: Controls whether the linked 'Agent Definition' can currently use this specific capability.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls whether this specific capability link between the agent and the action is active. Check this to enable the parent Agent Definition to use this capability. Uncheck to disable this capability for this specific agent without affecting the underlying Action Definition or other agents using it. Default: Checked (Active).
CustomField.label: Capability Active for Agent
